Package fr.cnrs.iees.identity.impl

package fr.cnrs.iees.identity.impl

Implementation classes for interfaces of fr.cnrs.iees.identity.

WARNING: although working perfectly, this class hierarchy has some conceptual flaws; some concepts, like the possibility to ask a scope if a proposed id would fit in its current state, or immutability of identities, are not properly captured in the current hierarchy and will be refactored soon (hopefully).

Author:
Jacques Gignoux - 20 ao√ªt 2021
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    GUIDIdentity
    Implementation of universally unique Identity based on UUID.
    IntegerScope
    A very crude but very fast scope to create unique identifiers as incremental long numbers, starting at 0.
    LocalScope
    A local scope, keeping track of all its ids.
    PairIdentity
    Implementation of Identity based on a (label,name) String pair.
    PairLocalScope
    A local scope for an identity based on a pair label+name.
    ResettableLocalScope
    A LocalScope that can forget all its id on reset.
    SimpleIdentity
    Implementation of Identity based on a String.
    UidIdentity
    Implementation of universally unique Identity based on Uid.
    UniversalScope
    A 'universal' scope for unique ids.
